CSSStyleValue.summary: The CSSStyleValue interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API is the base class of all CSS values accessible through the Typed OM API. An instance of this class may be used anywhere a string is expected.

CSSStyleValueParseAll.summary:
The parseAll() static method of the
interface sets all occurrences of a specific CSS property to the specified value and
returns an array of objects, each containing one of the
supplied values.

remarks.para:
-CSSStyleValue.parse()
-Using the CSS Typed OM
-CSS Typed Object Model API

CSSStyleValueParseAll.returns:
An array of CSSStyleValue objects, each containing one of the supplied
values.

CSSStyleValueParse.summary:
The parse() static method of the
interface sets a specific CSS property to the specified values and returns the first
value as a object.

remarks.para:
-CSSStyleValue.parseAll()
-Using the CSS Typed OM
-CSS Typed Object Model API

CSSStyleValueParse.returns: A CSSStyleValue object containing the first supplied value.
